title: Ningen Fushin no Boukensha-tachi ga Sekai wo Sukuu you desu
synopsis: The story begins with Nick, an experienced adventurer whose party is led by his mentor and father-figure Argus. Following the completion of their latest job, Nick discovers a chunk of the money has gone missing and realizes one of the party members is the culprit. To his surprise, Argus forgives the member and instead expels Nick after being accused of also embezzling funds.
related_anime: ['Ningen Fushin no Boukensha-tachi ga Sekai wo Sukuu you desu']
